Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: talks
Description: Talks by Matt Layher.  MIT Licensed.

Name: rtorrent_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from rTorrent. MIT Licensed.

Name: wol
Description: Package wol implements a Wake-on-LAN client.  MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from apcupsd's NIS. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: wgipam
Description: Command wgipamd implements an IP Address Management (IPAM) daemon for dynamic IP address assignment to WireGuard peers, using the wg-dynamic protocol. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: wgdynamic-go
Description: Package wgdynamic implements a client and server for the the wg-dynamic protocol. MIT Licensed.

Name: raw
Description: Package raw enables reading and writing data at the device driver level for a network interface.  MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
